title.narrative: F.a: Tourism Sector Union Building in Mozambique

description.narrative: The project supports negotiation skills training of 150 active union members and leaders, negotiating 50 new company level CBAs, establishment of 80 new workplace level local branches and recruitment of around 1 500 new paying members to the Mozambican tou rism sector union. Despite its relatively high membership density the union is not visible and relevant enough among the tourism sector workers and this is due to the inadequate number of local branches and inadequate negotiation skills. Hence development of more effective ways to defend the interests of members is expected to raise the status of SINTIHOTS. As a result it is expected that the negotiations and member services become more efficient, members become more active and the union improves its financ ial self-sustainability. The beneficiaries are workers of the rapidly growing Mozambican tourism sector, and the project is implemented by SINTIHOTS, the national union organizing hotel and restaurant workers.
